**Government Tender Announcement: Translation Services for Military With Six Selected Suppliers**

**Tender Reference:** PW-__ZF-523-41085, Solicitation Number: EP745-230736/A
**Publication Date:** 2022-08-24
**Closes on:** 2022-09-08 at 2:00 pm ET

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) intends to acquire translation services from English to French in the military land sector, encompassing up to 25,000,000 words over a three-year period, with an option for two one-year extensions. The Crown may award up to two contracts.

**Trade Agreement:** None
**Competition Process:** Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall Proposal
**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:** No

**Contract Specifications:**

* Initial period: Three years with a maximum volume of 7,500,000 words.
* Two irrevocable one-year extensions with a maximum volume of 2,500,000 words each.

**Eligible Suppliers:**

Only suppliers who are pre-qualified in the Tier 3 field of Military Land Element, from English to French, under the Supply Arrangement (SA) EN966-140305, are eligible toBid. The selected suppliers for this tender are:

* LIONBRIDGE LTD
* R&R INTERNATIONAL TRANSLATION
* SONOVISION CANADA INC
* NATIONS TRANSLATION GROUP LP

**Tendering Procedure:**
The bid solicitation will be circulated to the pre-qualified suppliers via email by the Contracting Officer. Inquiries regarding this tender call should be directed to the Contracting Authority at TPSGC.PADDSBT-APRFPTB.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Delivery Date:** The delivery date will be in accordance with the specifications outlined in the tender call.

This invitation to tender is issued under the Trade Agreement: None. Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries regarding this tender call, please contact Anne Larche, Contracting Officer, at anne.larche@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. The contact information for Public Works and Government Services Canada is as follows:
